frontMatter.title: üéâ Smash into October at Claremont Stadium! üè∏
frontMatter.summary: Join us on the last day of September at Claremont Stadium for a fun evening of badminton. Open courts and activities for all ages!

prev.title: Beginner Club Night at Claremont Stadium
prev.summary: Join us tonight from 9pm to 11pm at Claremont Stadium for Beginner Club Night. Whether you're new to badminton or need some practice, we'll have you rallying quickly. All 4 courts are open for a fun-filled evening!

next.title: üè∏ Join Us at Claremont Stadium Tonight!
next.summary: Join us at Claremont Stadium for a fun-filled evening of badminton. Open courts from 8pm to 11pm, with a special Juvenile Club Night starting at 6:30pm for ages 14+.
